greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, a(2n) = 1 + a(n), a(2n+1) = 1 + a(A250470(2n+1)); also binary width of terms of A252754 and A252756.
comment: a(n) tells how many iterations of A253554 are needed before 1 is reached, i.e., the distance of n from 1 in binary trees like A252753 and A252755.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
program: (Scheme, three versions, first one using memoization macro definec)
xref: Differs from A252464 for the first time at n=21, where a(21) = 4, while A252463(21) = 5.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 12 2015
